desc:2546071100: Divine Storm projects an additional wave of light, striking all enemies up to {1} yds in front of you for {2}% of Divine Storm's damage.
desc:3893268573: Mastery: Lightbringer now increases your healing based on the target's proximity to either you or your Beacon of Light, whichever is closer.
desc:2062877990: Word of Glory's mana cost is reduced by {1}% and now reduces the cooldown of Blessing of Freedom by {2} sec when cast, but its healing is reduced by {3}% when cast on allies.
desc:3712551816: Allies affected by your Blessings have {1}% increased movement speed.
desc:522656927:
When you or an ally wielding a Holy Bulwark are healed above maximum health, transfer {1}% of the overhealing to your ally.

When you or an ally wielding a Sacred Weapon drop below {2}% health, redistribute your health immediately and every {3} sec for {4} sec. May only occur once per cast.
desc:1234732045: The duration of stun effects on you is reduced by {1}%.
desc:4265732221:
Removing harmful effects with Divine Shield heals you for {1}% for each effect removed.  This heal cannot exceed {2}% of your maximum health.

Divine Shield may now be cast while Forbearance is active.
desc:146346740:
Divine Steed reduces the cooldown of {1} nearby ally's major movement ability by {2} sec.

Your movement speed is increased by {3}%.
desc:1160553706: Turn Evil now affects {1} additional enemies.
desc:569203949: Blessing of Sacrifice now removes and prevents all Poison and Disease effects.
desc:407947786:
You automatically cast Blessing of Sacrifice onto an ally within {1} yds when they are below {2}% health and you are not in a loss of control effect.

This effect activates {3}% of Blessing of Sacrifice's cooldown.
desc:2632373756:
Divine Steed also grants Blessing of Freedom for {1} sec.

|T135968:24|t {ffffffff|Blessing of Freedom}:
Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to movement impairing effects for {2} sec.
desc:3573423252: Your Forbearance's duration is reduced by {1} sec.
desc:4019669595: Holy Power spending abilities have {1}% increased damage and healing.
desc:3874461215: Eye for an Eye can now also trigger at {1}% effectiveness from direct Magic damage.
desc:961061272: After Cleanse successfully removes an effect from an ally, they are healed for {1}.
desc:1578133531: {1}% of all healing done to you from other sources heals up to {2} nearby allies, divided evenly among them.
desc:3246909537: Reduces the cooldown of Divine Protection by {1} sec, Hand of Sacrifice by {2} sec and Avenging Wrath by {3} sec.
desc:4117054844: Divine Protection increases healing taken by {1}% for its duration.
desc:3949090047: The radius of your auras is increased by {1} yds.
desc:3078044925: Divine Steed's cooldown is reduced by {1}%, but its duration is reduced by {2}%.
